external.description:
Alt: Turtle Graphics are older than Ice Cube, and yet still cool to any kid lucky enough to play around with them.

Months of work to make an inspiring gift that keeps on giving have paid off :-).  Today was a good day.
external.title: a man in a bandana is driving a car with the words `` today was a good day '' written above him .

record.text:
Update:

Showed off the prototypes to the nieces.

Told them "I betcha I can draw 100 pictures in a minute."

52 seconds and 100 pretty pictures later, the ~5 year old was happily mashing the touchscreen and the 8 year old was  skeptically curious.

I'm calling that a win.

Today was a good day.
